Type-hint for Express types

Dinoloop is an Expressjs library and its philosophy is not to tie user to specific expressjs version. With such philosophy there comes some caveats. The Request, Response, NextFunction properties of ApiController are expressjs types, to have type-hint on express objects in development, you are supposed to override node_modules/dinoloop/modules/types/express.d.ts contents after you install @types/express.

First install expressjs types (version of your choice)


    

    
Now paste following content inside
        node_modules/dinoloop/modules/types/express.d.ts
    

    

        

    

    
You will now be able to have type-hint on expressjs objects in development.





    

        
        Remember
    

    
    
        
  • 
            You will have to provide the path for expressjs types where it is installed.
        
    • 
        
  • 
            You dont need to map expressjs types in production environment.
